nodes.text: The Imperial News Network was the news agency that operated under the Imperial Remnant sometime in 44 ABY.

During the 44 ABY Imperial Election, Imperial Head of State Jagged Fel signed a charter which gave a massive endowment to the INN which allowed it to continue its operations for centuries while also granting it independence from any and all forms of government censorship. The INN was then charged to keep an eye on all the activities of both the Head of State and the Moffs so as to insure the swift transition from an autocratic regime to a democracy.
